bio:
Viinturuth (Dragon Language: Shine-Hammer-Rage) is a dragon found in the wilds of Skyrim. He speaks in native dragon tongue when in the presence of other dragons. He is aggressive, and attacks using fire or ice. He is often found in the company of Alduin, but will not join Alduin in any fight against the Dragonborn.
Viinturuth can be found being resurrected by Alduin, west of Anga's Mill.
name: Viinturuth
